response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation, quality, and craftsmanship. I understand that its true value may be subjective, but I assure you, it has been priced to reflect its unparalleled worth.

I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $950,000. This represents a significant discount compared to the market value, making it an exceptional deal for someone with discerning taste and a penchant for acquiring premium items.

Please consider this offer carefully. I believe that once you experience the product firsthand, you will appreciate its unique qualities and understand the value we are offering. If you have any questions or require more information, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
